original_request: Review the agent and skill modals (when you click on them) and redesign them based on the content available. Use the user experience team to help design and the frontend agents to develop it.

decisions.decision: Agent modal emphasizes personality with avatar, tools, key phrases
decisions.rationale: Agents are personas - need to convey character

decisions.decision: Skill modal emphasizes data flow with handoff visualization
decisions.rationale: Skills are functional - show how they connect

decisions.decision: 4px domain accent bar at top of both modals
Two-column stats grid for skill metrics
